mapper.sql: id as id , resourceId as resourceId , divId as divId , actionScript as actionScript , name as name , actionAlias as actionAlias , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , description as description
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mubs_resource_action ( resourceId, divId, actionScript, name, actionAlias, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{resourceId}, #{divId}, #{actionScript}, #{name}, #{actionAlias}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO mubs_resource_action ( resourceId, divId, actionScript, name, actionAlias, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{map.resourceId}, #{map.divId}, #{map.actionScript}, #{map.name}, #{map.actionAlias}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource_action
resourceId = #{resourceId},
divId = #{divId},
actionScript = #{actionScript},
name = #{name},
actionAlias = #{actionAlias},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE mubs_resource_action
resourceId = #{map.resourceId},
divId = #{map.divId},
actionScript = #{map.actionScript},
name = #{map.name},
actionAlias = #{map.actionAlias},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE mubs_resource_action
resourceId = #{update.resourceId},
divId = #{update.divId},
actionScript = #{update.actionScript},
name = #{update.name},
actionAlias = #{update.actionAlias},
creator = #{update.creator},
createDate = #{update.createDate},
lastModifier = #{update.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{update.lastModDate},
description = #{update.description},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, resourceId
, divId
, actionScript
, name
, actionAlias
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
, description
FROM mubs_resource_action
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1

, id

FROM mubs_resource_action
